description: standing woman wearing a transparent veil, looking up, holding a baby with her PR arm and reaching down to a standing child clinging to her PL hand; sketched architectural details at left
inscription:
Inscription

on back of mount, in pencil: [R / Charity by Cipriani]
medium: Pen and gray ink with brown wash over black chalk on laid paper
provenance: Sale, Sotheby's, London, May 29, 1975, no.150, for Â£30, to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1975-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Design for a Funerary Monument with Caritas
